DescriptionData.Title: Elevated Dog Bowls, Raised Dog Bowls, Stainless Steel Dog Bowls for Small and Medium Dogs, Dog Food Bowl, Cat Bowls with Stand (Large)
DescriptionData.Description:
ColorOrange

Material:Stainless Steel and Melamine

A slanted bowl prevents food from sticking around the bottom rim of the conventional bowl where dog/cat can't get it. What's more, it enabled your cat/dog to eat easier as the bowl is on a slanted angle, aiding your pet's digestion in the process.

OUR MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: CHRUNONE offers a 100% money-back guarantee, we will offer a 30-day money back guarantee on this product only if purchased directly from CHRUNONE. To ensure customer satisfaction end up happy1111.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Elevated dog bowls - ergonomic 15 degrees tilted design makes the food concentrate on the bottom and makes your pet easy to empty the food, as well as reduces risk of "bloat" And indigestion
Non-spill dog bowl with stand - dogs tend to stack Food to the edge, higher round arc design makes food not easy to overflow the edge
Stainless steel dog bowls stable and non-slip - hard to turn over, heavy-duty stand with non-slip feet
Raised dog bowls easy to clean - both melamine stand and stainless steel bowl are dishwasher safe, Super easy to clean and wipe
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: Elevated Dog Bowls, Raised Dog Bowls, Stainless Steel Dog Bowls for Large Dogs, Dog Food Bowl, Cat Bowls with Stand
